import { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useSelector, useDispatch } from "react-redux"; import { Table, Title, Modal, Loader, QuickAddPlayersToGame } from "./"; import { EditPlayerStatsModal, AddPlayerGameStatsModal } from "./modals"; const EditGame = ({ setIsEditing, playerHeaders, playerColumns }) => { const [showEditPlayerStatsModal, setShowEditPlayerStatsModal] = useState(false); const [showAddPlayerStatsModal, setShowAddPlayerStatsModal] = useState(false); const [selectedPlayer, setSelectedPlayer] = useState(null); const { game, players, singleGameLoading } = useSelector(state => ({ ...state.games, ...state.players })); useEffect(() => { playerHeaders.push({ label: '' }) playerColumns.edit = { type: 'button', func: (e) => { setShowEditPlayerStatsModal(true) setSelectedPlayer(e) }, as: 'Edit', className: 'w-0 whitespace-nowrap' } }, []) console.log(playerColumns, 'playerColumns') const { has_been_played, opponent, location, start_date, player_stats } = game; return ( <> {(closeModal) => } {(closeModal) => }
